content: Enter the {{productName}} domain name without URL paths or additional characters.

comment.text: The "CSPUrlHelp" translation key is used to provide a help message when entering an invalid domain name for Content Security Policy (CSP) in the UI. It guides users to enter only the product name without URL paths or extra characters, appearing in a text component.

usage.context:
</Container>
 <Text
 lineHeight="20px"
 color={error ? theme?.input.focusErrorBorderColor : globalColors.gray}
 >
 {error || t("CSPUrlHelp", { productName: t("Common:ProductName") })}
 </Text>
 <ChipsContainer>{getChips(cspDomains)}</ChipsContainer>
 </>
 );
 };

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The curly braces {{productName}} are not properly rendered as placeholders in the Arabic translation. They should be treated as part of the text and not as placeholders to be replaced.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: أدخل اسم مجال {{productName}} بدون مسارات URL أو أحرف إضافية.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Azerbaijani translation uses a mixture of capital and lowercase letters. While not strictly incorrect, it's common practice in Azerbaijani to capitalize the beginning of sentences and proper nouns, but not for general words within a phrase.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Domen adını URL yolları və ya əlavə simvollar olmadan {{productName}} daxil edin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Zadejte název domény {{productName}} bez cest URL nebo dalších znaků.' is a literal translation but lacks clarity. A more natural Czech phrasing would be preferable. The phrase 'cest URL' is not idiomatic.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Zadejte doménu {{productName}} bez URL adres a dalších znaků.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'URL' appears in English in the Czech translation. It's best to replace it with the Czech equivalent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'URL' with 'URL adres' or 'webových adres'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'verkkotunnus' is a more formal term for 'domain name'. A more natural and user-friendly translation might use a more common word.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Syötä {{productName}} -verkkosivun osoite ilman URL-polkuja tai lisämerkkejä.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'տիրույթի' (tiruyti) is technically correct but could be more naturally phrased as 'տիրույթ' (tiruyt) in this context. The addition of '-ի' (i) creates a genitive case, implying possession, which isn't necessary here.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Մուտքագրեք {{productName}} տիրույթ անունը առանց URL ուղիների կամ լրացուցիչ նիշերի:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Korean translation uses a full stop (.) at the end of the sentence. While grammatically correct, in UI/UX contexts, a more common and cleaner approach is to omit the full stop, especially when the text is part of a form or input field instruction.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL 경로나 추가 문자를 제외한 {{productName}} 도메인 이름을 입력하세요

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ເສັ້ນທາງ' (sēn thāng) is a bit awkward in this context. While technically correct, a more natural phrasing might be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ໃສ່ຊື່ໂດເມນ {{productName}} ໂດຍບໍ່ມີສ່ວນເສັ້ນທາງ URL ຫຼືຕົວອັກສອນເພີ່ມເຕີມ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'vietrāža' is a less common and slightly awkward phrasing in this context. 'URL ceļiem' should likely be simplified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ievadiet {{productName}} domēna nosaukumu bez URL ceļiem vai papildu rakstzīmēm.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Introduceți' is a formal command. For a user interface element like this, a less formal option like 'Introduce' or 'Scrieți' would be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Introduce or Scrieți

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Enter the {{productName}} domain name' is better translated as 'Specify the {{productName}} domain name' or 'Provide the {{productName}} domain name'. 'Введите' (Vvedite) implies a more direct entry, while 'Specify' or 'Provide' are more suitable for a user input context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Укажите доменное имя {{productName}} без URL-адресов и дополнительных символов.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, it's more idiomatic Russian to slightly restructure the sentence. The current order sounds a little less natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Укажите доменное имя {{productName}} без URL-адресов и дополнительных символов.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "ඒ.ස.නි. හෝ අතිරේක අකුරු රහිතව" doesn't accurately convey "without URL paths or additional characters".  The Sinhala phrase translates more to 'without A.S.N. or additional characters'.  It doesn't cover URL paths.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඒ.ස.නි. හෝ වෙනත් අක්ෂరాలు, යpath නොමැතිව {{productName}} වසමේ නම ඇතුල් කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'path' is added in the suggested correction and might need a further clarification on its meaning for the target audience. It may be better to simplify the suggestion to avoid confusion.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඒ.ස.නි. හෝ වෙනත් අක්ෂර නොමැතිව {{productName}} වසමේ නම ඇතුල් කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation 'Zadajte názov domény {{productName}} bez určenia cesty URL alebo ďalších znakov.' is a bit literal and could be improved for better flow and clarity in Slovak. The phrase 'určenia cesty URL' is overly formal and could be simplified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Zadajte doménu {{productName}} bez URL adresy alebo iných znakov.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'URL' is an abbreviation and should ideally be translated to its Slovenian equivalent or explained. While understood, keeping it as 'URL' can feel unnatural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vnesite ime domene {{productName}} brez poti URL ali dodatnih znakov.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While acceptable, using 'poti URL' instead of just 'URL' improves readability and naturalness in Slovenian. It explicitly specifies that we are talking about URL paths.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No change needed if the target audience understands 'URL' in Slovenian.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Унеси {{productName}} домен име без URL стаза или додатних знакова' is not a precise translation of 'Enter the {{productName}} domain name without URL paths or additional characters'. 'Стаза' refers to a path or track, not 'paths' in the context of a URL. 'Знакова' is also an unusual choice, 'characters' would be better translated to something like 'карактера'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Унеси {{productName}} домен име без URL путева или додатних карактера.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'domen' should be 'domen(a)'. While 'domen' is understandable, 'domen(a)' is the grammatically correct form in Serbian for a domain name, depending on context and whether it's being treated as masculine or feminine.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Unesi {{productName}} domen(a) ime bez URL staza ili dodatnih znakova.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Nhập tên miền {{productName}} không có đường dẫn URL hoặc ký tự bổ sung' is a literal translation. A more natural Vietnamese phrasing would be 'Nhập tên miền {{productName}} mà không có đường dẫn URL hoặc ký tự đặc biệt.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nhập tên miền {{productName}} mà không có đường dẫn URL hoặc ký tự đặc biệt.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'hoặc' (or) is followed by 'ký tự bổ sung' which is not as natural as 'ký tự đặc biệt'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nhập tên miền {{productName}} mà không có đường dẫn URL hoặc ký tự đặc biệt.
